properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for CORS

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed HTTP methods for CORS

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed headers for CORS

properties.name: app.cors.exposed-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of exposed headers for CORS

properties.name: app.cors.allow-credentials
properties.description: Whether to allow credentials in CORS requests

properties.name: app.cors.max-age
properties.description: Maximum age (in seconds) for CORS preflight cache

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.resourceserver.jwt.issuer-uri
properties.description: The URI of the OAuth2 authorization server issuer

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.resourceserver.jwt.audiences
properties.description: The expected audience for JWT token validation
